name: IT201 Sprint 4 Project
description: This is a paint project where the user can use various 3D shapes to draw on the screen by clicking the left button or holding down the left button. They can use the side panel with features to draw their objects by choosing shape, color, automatic destroy or manual destroy. They can also add animations to the flower and magic object by pressing 1,2,3 keys on their keyboard. And they can view time and directions by using the space key.
